title: An Italians dead bodie, stucke with English flowers elegies, on the death of Sir Oratio Pallauicino.
author: Field, Theophilus, 1574-1636.
publisher: Printee [sic] by Thomas Creede, for Andrew Wise, and are to be sold at his shop in Powles Church-yard,
notes: Verses by Theophilus Field (ed.), Joseph Hall, and others.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
